name: RTCRtpStreamStats.codecId
description: The RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary's codecId property is a string which uniquely identifies the object that was inspected to produce the data in the RTCCodecStats for the RTP stream.

refs.name: Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API
